name: Bella's Voyage
description:
TREASURE LIES within a mysterious temple containing magical warp points leading to fantastical worlds. The secret to this treasure lies with the stars in these worlds, and intrepid adventurer Bella intends to find this treasure no matter what. Collect the stars so you may unlock the secrets of this temple and obtain its great treasure! Treasure hunting and platforming action awaits in...Bella's Voyage.

  • EXPLORE 3 action packed levels.
  • COLLECT stars to retrieve the treasure.
  • AVOID dangerous enemies and traps.
  • USE Bella's different jumping moves to navigate each world.

CONTROLS
Left and Right - Move
X - Jump
Down - Crouch
